Question & Options:
Which of the following statements are true regarding the film's trailer and its shooting locations?
Options:
A. The trailer was released on various platforms.
B. The film was shot at the UN headquarters.
C. The film is the first Bollywood movie to be shot at the UN headquarters.
D. The trailer features scenes from the UN headquarters.
Correct Answer: b) The film was shot at the UN headquarters. and c) The film is the first Bollywood movie to be shot at the UN headquarters.
